title: European Business Law  Specialization
description: Launch your career in Europe. Master the essentials in European Business Law.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of legal concepts and business principles recommended.
learning_outcomes: Master essential aspects of European business law to launch a career in Europe. Learn to navigate the internal market and understand relevant legal frameworks.

title: Corporate & Commercial Law I: Contracts & Employment Law
description: This class deals with the business law topics that appear on the CPA exam: Agency, Contracts, Debtor-Creditor Relationships, Government Regulation of Business, and Business Organizations. Students will gain an understanding of how these areas of the law affect businesses and their operations, with an eye on preparation for the business law portions of the REG section of the CPA exam. By the end of the class, students will be able to identify the legal principles that govern various business situations and apply those principles to an issue to determine the outcome when the law is applied to the facts of a scenario.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of business principles is helpful, but not required.
Familiarity with legal terminology is an advantage.
learning_outcomes: Identify legal principles governing business situations. Apply these principles to analyze scenarios and determine legal outcomes. Prepare for the business law portion of the CPA exam (REG section).
price: Coursera offers courses with a free audit option; however, a fee applies for certification.

title: European Business Law: Competing in Europe
learning_outcomes: Understand EU competition law, including antitrust regulations and merger control. Learn to analyze market structures, assess competitive impacts, and develop compliant business strategies within the European market.

title: European Business Law: Understanding the Fundamentals
description: The European Union is one of the world’s largest and most important economies. This six week course is the first in a series of three that will provide students with an insight into European Business Law. The series ranges from considering the basic structures and principles of the European Union to focusing on various specialized areas of law. Each course will give the students an understanding of the laws and policies that regulate the internal market of European Union, as well as relevant case law and useful inputs from leading practitioners in the field.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of business concepts and an interest in international economics and law are recommended.
learning_outcomes: Understand the basic structures and principles of the European Union, the laws and policies regulating its internal market, and relevant case law. Gain insights from leading practitioners in the field.
price: Coursera offers both free audit options and paid certificate options. Cost varies by subscription or individual purchase.

title: European Business Law: Doing Business in Europe
description: This six-week course titled Doing Business in Europe is the second in a series of three exploring some of the main business aspects of European Union law. Besides providing learners with a sound knowledge base of European laws and regulations relevant to establishing and managing a company within the European Union, the course also explores business considerations within a broader perspective by including inputs from leading law practitioners in the field. More specifically, the course discusses strategic and financial considerations within Company law, as well as Labour law issues such as restructuring enterprises, working conditions and handling crises situations. The course also examines other legal areas such as Tax law, Environmental law and Private International law, and how they tie in to doing business in Europe.
prerequisites: Familiarity with legal concepts is helpful but not required
learning_outcomes: Gain knowledge of EU laws relevant to managing a company within the EU, including Company, Labour, Tax, and Environmental Law. Explore business considerations, financial strategies, and crisis handling within the European legal framework.

title: European Business Law Specialization
description: The European Union is one of the world's largest and most important economies. This specialization is a 3-course bundle that will teach learners the fundamentals of European Business Law.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of legal concepts and business principles is recommended.
learning_outcomes: Gain a fundamental understanding of European Business Law, including key regulations and legal frameworks within the European Union's economic system.

title: Introduction to Business Law
description: Learn the fundamentals of business law as you discover how knowledge of the legal system is crucial for all professionals.
learning_outcomes: Understand business law fundamentals and the importance of legal knowledge for professionals. Gain insights into the legal system's relevance in various business contexts.

title: Business Law and the Fashion Industry
description: Build your knowledge of the business laws and requirements needed to start, run, and expand a fashion brand of any size.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of business principles recommended but not required.
learning_outcomes: Gain knowledge of business laws and requirements for starting, running, and expanding a fashion brand, regardless of size. Understand legal aspects of the fashion industry.

title: Introduction to Business Law
description: Learn the fundamentals of business law as you discover how knowledge of the legal system is crucial for all professionals.
learning_outcomes: Understand the core principles of business law. Learn how the legal system impacts business professionals. Discover the importance of legal knowledge in various professional settings.

title: Business Law and the Fashion Industry
description: Build your knowledge of the business laws and requirements needed to start, run, and expand a fashion brand of any size.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of business concepts or an interest in the fashion industry.
learning_outcomes: Understand business laws for starting, running, and expanding a fashion brand. Learn legal requirements for businesses in the fashion industry, regardless of size.

title: Introduction to Business Law
description: Learn the fundamentals of business law as you discover how knowledge of the legal system is crucial for all professionals.
learning_outcomes: Understand fundamental business law principles and how the legal system impacts business operations. Learn about contracts, intellectual property, and other key legal areas relevant to professionals in various industries.

title: Business Law and the Fashion Industry
description: Build your knowledge of the business laws and requirements needed to start, run, and expand a fashion brand of any size.
learning_outcomes: Understand business laws relevant to fashion. Learn the requirements for starting, running, and expanding a fashion brand. Gain knowledge applicable to fashion businesses of all sizes.
